items.text: good length on off stump, leading edge to backward point as he defends on the back foot
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full and just outside off, driven on the up to extra cover
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length, skids through and strikes him on the pads in front of middle as he looks to flick off the back foot. Pitched outside leg
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full and just outside off, flicked to deep midwicket on the front foot
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: good length and drifted in at off stump. Defended on the front foot
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: good length on off stump, defended off the back foot
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: floated up outside off, reaches out and turns it to deep midwicket on the full
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: good length, lopped up at leg stump. Defended on the front foot with a big reach and hard hands
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length outside off, pushed to point's right on the front foot. His throw at the non-striker's end is not backed up and they get a second at deep midwicket
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: good length and slanted across the corridor. Drives on the up off the low part of the bat and it ends up a chip over the non-striker. Enough bat for the boundary
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: short of a length just outside off, stands tall and steers to third man
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: short and wide outside off, pushed to third man with an open face
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: top edge as he struggles under another bouncer. This is heading for his throat and he takes his eyes off as he looks to hook. No room at all, and he's in a poor position for that shot. Four from over the keeper
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: good length and just outside off, driven on the up to extra cover
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short and wide outside off, cut straight to point on the bounce
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: good length and dropping at an off stump line. Pushes forward and drops it into the leg side with soft hands
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short and turning into middle stump, backs away and slices it past backward point
items.shortText: Cremer to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: good length and wide outside off. Pushed through cover on the front foot
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, tapped to sweeper on the back foot
items.shortText: Cremer to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: good length on leg stump, deflected wide of short fine off the front foot
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: back of a length and spinning in at leg stump, glanced wide of short fine off the back foot
items.postText: Nonymous: "Sri Lankan fan here.. am i correct in saying that we need BD to win this game, ideally by a big margin? " --- Ideally, yes.
items.shortText: Cremer to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: loopy ball drifted in at leg stump. Steps out and doesn't make the pitch. Wafts forcefully at it and gets a thick outside edge to backward point's left
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: good length on middle stump, on the back foot to work this to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short of a length on off stump, chopped to deep point
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full on leg stump, doesn't get to the pitch for the flick. It rolls back to the bowler
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, no run
